EmailTemplate.name: AA_Report_Accepted1
EmailTemplate.subject: Your “Agent” report has been published : {!aa_Agent_Report__c.Report_Title__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!aa_Agent_Report__c.CreatedBy}, Thank you for your “Agent” report. Your report has been reviewed and published in The Agent app. You can share your report with your colleagues by using the @mention functionality in the “Agent” app. PS: This is an auto generated mail, please do not reply. Thanks, The Agent
